mansfield.edu.jphillip.maze
Class AController

java.lang.Object
  mansfield.edu.jphillip.maze.AController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class AController
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

MVC Controller: receives a handle to the View and controls everything that happens as the program runs. It maintains a separate thread that allows for simple animation. In addition, AController handles all of the events generated when buttons are clicked or keys are pressed. License: CC BY-SA 3.0 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/

Author:
John Phillips

Nested Class Summary
private  class AController.AgainBtnActionListener
          When the againBtn is clicked the same maze game is started over.
private  class AController.LastBtnActionListener
          When lastBtn is clicked the previous (simpler) maze file is loaded and the game is restarted.
(package private)  class AController.MyKeyListener
          Detects when arrow keys are pressed and moves the player icon through the maze.
private  class AController.NextBtnActionListener
          When nextBtn is clicked the next (harder) maze file is loaded and the game is restarted.
private  class AController.PlayerColorCBActionListener
          The color combo box allows the player to choose different colors for the simple shape objects that represent the player on the screen.
private  class AController.PlayerShapeCBActionListener
          The shape combo box allows the player to choose different shapes or images to represent the player on the screen.

Constructor Detail

AController

public AController(AView view)
The constructor for the AController class. It is called from MazeApp.

Parameters:
view - the MVC view is passed in from MazeApp.java. This allows the controller to interact with any part of the view or controlPanel or drawingPanel.

Used to set up a new board, player pieces, sounds, and music.

setNewShape

private void setNewShape(int r,
                         int c,
                         java.lang.String shape)
Creates a new MazeShape object for the human player.

Parameters:
r - the board row the object will sit on
c - the board column the object will sit on
shape - the shape the object will take

refresh

private void refresh()
Repaints the drawingPanel and returns focus to the frame which listens for key presses.

checkFinish

private void checkFinish()
Checks to see if the someone has reached the maze end.

run

public void run()
Adds animation to the game allowing a robot object to move around on the screen.

Specified by:
run in interface java.lang.Runnable

setupListeners

private void setupListeners()
Adds listeners to the controls on the controlPanel. This is necessary since the View is created before the Controller. Hence, after the Controller is created we add the Controller's listeners back on to the View's controls using these callbacks.
